events.message: I reported a car accident that occurred yesterday involving my sedan and another vehicle at an intersection.
The claim was categorised under auto accident after reviewing the initial report filed by the customer.
An agent has been assigned to handle the case to maintain communication and manage subsequent steps in the process.
We acknowledge receipt of your claim regarding the vehicle collision and will proceed with further investigation.
Please provide pictures of the damaged car, police report, and any repair estimates to facilitate claim processing.
Customer has submitted all requested documents including photos of the damaged vehicle and an official police report.
Investigation into the accident circumstances and insurance coverage details has started to assess claim validity.
The accident investigation is complete; findings support the claim and indicate liability for repairs.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on repair cost estimates and policy coverage details.
Customer responded positively to the settlement offer and expressed appreciation for the smooth handling of the claim.
The claim has been officially approved following acceptance of the proposed settlement terms.
Payment for the approved claim amount has been issued to the customerâ€™s account for vehicle repair coverage.
The claim has been closed after final payment was confirmed and all related case documentation completed.
The closed claim case files have been archived in accordance with regulatory retention policies and procedures.
